text: Here is a draft website in Markdown format for your dissertation consulting business, Neuron Consulting:

title: neuron-consulting
text:
About
Neuron Consulting was founded by Dr. David J. Bauer to provide specialized consulting services to graduate students working on their thesis or dissertation.
::: {#alert .alert .alert-dismissible alert-warning} Dr. Bauer holds a PhD in Psychology from the University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee. With over 10 years of experience successfully guiding graduate students through the research process, he understands the unique challenges these students face. :::

Neuron Consulting draws upon Dr. Bauer’s expertise in research design, statistical analysis, writing support, and project management to help students overcome hurdles and complete their thesis/dissertation efficiently and confidently.

title: neuron-consulting
text:
Services
Neuron Consulting provides customized support including:

Topic selection and refinement
Literature reviews
Research design assistance
IRB application support
Quantitative and qualitative analysis
Statistical consulting with SPSS, R, etc.
Writing and editing services
Final proofreading and feedback

Dr. Bauer works closely with each client to provide tailored guidance based on their research topic, methodology, analysis approach, and goals.

title: neuron-consulting
text:
Contact
Ready to get started on your thesis or dissertation? Reach out today to schedule your free 30-minute consultation.
Email: davidjbauer@neuronconsulting.com
Phone: 507-494-8580
Address: 6080 State Hwy 16, Hokah, MN 55941
